name: Masked HERO Dusk Crow
text: If this card is in your hand: You can banish 1 "HERO" monster from your GY; Special Summon this card. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Masked HERO" monster from your Deck or GY to your hand, except "Masked HERO Dusk Crow". You can only use each effect of "Masked HERO Dusk Crow" once per turn.
